Html:
Hi,

       I am doing a C#.NET project on Windows CE platform, I want to use GMap.NET in my application, I downloaded the recent patch  'greatmaps-44518'. Here I'm unable to open the GMap.NET.sln, it says Unable to open 'GMap.NET.WindowsForm.cs', tool '4.0' is unrecognised, I get this for other GMap.Net projects as well. Can anyone tell me what seems to be the problem? & what is the remedy?  Also i cannot find GMap.NET.WindowForm.dll or any other dll to be added as control to toolbox, how to add MainMap tool to toolbox?
